thread.section_title: Studds Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Studds | studds.com.au
thread.title: AchtungBaby77

author: AchtungBaby77
title: AchtungBaby77
text: I shopped around for several weeks looking for a good quality road bike but didn't want to break the bank. I was amazed at the low prices offered by Studds but was a little weary about purchasing a bike online, especially sight unseen. I rang Studds and spoke to James and he professionally helped me with all my queries over the telephone and assisted in selecting a bike suitable for me - I opted for the STUDDS 100 RB. It arrived at my doorstep in Adelaide within 48 hours of payment. Assembly was relatively straightforward and I went for a 16km ride that same day and loved every minute of it. The quality of the frame, handlebars and Shimano brakes are top-notch and commonly seen in $1,000+ models. I'm ecstatic with my purchase and couldn't be happier - I have recommended Studds to all my friends and family.
